sentences.en: A liquid junction is the interface between two miscible electrolyte solutions.
sentences.cn: 液体接界是两个可混溶液的电解质溶液之间的界面.

sentences.en: Another car shot out of a junction and smashed into the back of them.
sentences.cn: 另一辆车从交叉路口飞驰而出，撞到了他们汽车的尾部。

sentences.en: At this junction Maston could not repress his emotion.
sentences.cn: 到了这个阶段,梅斯顿再也克制不住自己的感情了.

sentences.en: Follow the road to a junction and turn left.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条路到交叉路口，然后左转。

sentences.en: He knew how the traffic congested at the junction of Seventh Avenue and Forty - second Street.
sentences.cn: 他知道在第7街和第42街交叉处交通是多么拥挤.

sentences.en: He occasionally infringe the law by parking near a junction.
sentences.cn: 他因偶尔将车停放在交叉口附近而违反规定.

sentences.en: He was killed at a road junction by a van driver who went through a red light.
sentences.cn: 他在交叉路口被一辆闯红灯的小货车撞死了。

sentences.en: It was near the junction of City Road and Old Street.
sentences.cn: 那是在城市路与老街的交叉路口附近。
在25号交叉路口驶离1号高速公路。

sentences.en: Let the junction of the three fracture lines have a virtual displacement.
sentences.cn: 令三条折断线的相交处有一虚位移.

sentences.en: The cars collided at the junction.
The gas station is at the junction of two highways.
sentences.cn: 这个加油站位于两条公路的会合处.

sentences.en: the junction of Abbot Road and Mill Street
sentences.cn: 阿伯特路与米尔街的交叉口

sentences.en: The power station stands at the junction of two rivers.
sentences.cn: 发电站在两条河流的汇合处.

sentences.en: There's a bridge at the junction of the two rivers.
You must give way when you come to this junction.
sentences.cn: 你到了这个路口必须让路.

phrases.tran_cn: 结温；接点温度；接面溫度
面结型晶体管；结式晶体管
三联点；三重接头；三向连接构造

trans.tran_cn: 连接，接合，会合点，接合点，（公路或铁路的）交叉路口，（电缆等的）主结点
trans.tran_en: a place where one road, track etc joins another
